error.message: Parameter $entityManager of method Drupal\private_message_nodejs\Form\PrivateMessageNodejsForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_copy(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::copy().
Call to deprecated function file_uri_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\StreamWrapper\StreamWrapperManagerInterface::getScheme() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to private_message_nodejs.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
